Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • projet.frigo.A3.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This contains the representation of all Data, and all treatement that might occurs to it

        public void onValueChanges(java.lang.String temp1,

        humi1 - Our new Humidity
        temp2_rosee - Our new Rosée Point

      • onConsigneChange

        public java.lang.String onConsigneChange(int i)
        This function changes the ordered temperature according to the command ID
        Parameters:
        i - The command. 0= decrease ; 1= increase ; other= no change
        Returns:
        Our new ordered temperature
